page.title: 16Whittington Local Buses
page.content: The three bus companies that run through Whittington are{Hampsons,Owens and{Crosville.}Owens bus company is based at Park Hall and Hampsons at Oswestry.Owens run from Park Hall to Oswestry and from Oswestry to Whittington,on to Penybryn and Babbinswood and then back to Oswestry.Owens also run a service to Ellesmere which passes through the village.Hampsons run a similar service but not at the same times.Crosville runs to Shrewsbury stopping at Babbinswood and Whittington.It is also based in Oswestry.It costs Â£1.60 for adults and Â£1.05 for children.Owens buses are red,white and blue,Hampsons are cream and maroon and Crosville are light green and white.
